name: The Adventures of Box Boy
description:
You are Box Boy. Some sort of evil has stripped all the colour out of the world and its up to you to try and restore even just a little.

You gotta change shapes to break the walls down and kill the monsters.

Controls: Arrows/WSAD to Move, Space to Jump, Control to Change shape, Space/Enter to select menu item.

Music by Jesús Lastra - http://opengameart.org/users/jalastram
